html: To the hard-working federal employees Trump just screwed by cutting pay — the folks who run our parks, protect our communities, & serve our veterans: YOU MATTER. If billionaires can get tax cuts, you should get a COLA. You work hard for America & that should add up to something.

text:
Since I became New York’s AG, people have asked me how I deal with the relentless tide of toxic public policies coming out of Washington.
 
“Do you ever despair?”
 
My answer is simple. 

We don’t have time for that.pic.twitter.com/7kNYHhhkR8

html: At first, when Kavanagh was nominated, top GOP senators said that “it just seems to be common sense” that all his White House papers should be released. Then, on July 24, they met with Trump’s counsel. Turned on a dime. Now, releasing the papers would be “a bridge too far.” 1/
text:
At first, when Kavanagh was nominated, top GOP senators said that “it just seems to be common sense” that all his White House papers should be released. 

Then, on July 24, they met with Trump’s counsel. Turned on a dime. Now, releasing the papers would be “a bridge too far.” 1/

html: So I generally choose not to hang on every twist of the Mueller investigation, but if Trump pardons Manafort (after maybe having promised a pardon to get him not to cooperate) and gets away with it, then we’re in a banana republic. We just are.
text: So I generally choose not to hang on every twist of the Mueller investigation, but if Trump pardons Manafort (after maybe having  promised a pardon to get him not to cooperate) and gets away with it, then we’re in a banana republic. We just are.
